price: 88. Et telle était la plainte (du Prophète) : « Seigneur ! Ces gens ne croient pas. »
arabic: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqīlihi yārabbi inna hāulāi qawmun lā yu'minūna
